personal.name: Douglas Mo
personal.title:
Business Analytics
Graduate | AI Builder | AI Product Manager
personal.summary:
Analytically-driven professional transitioning from financial
accounting to AI/data systems development. Master's student in Business Analytics
with hands-on experience building production RAG systems, digital twins, and
full-stack AI applications. Combines 2+ years of international accounting
experience with practical AI development skills including vector databases, LLM
integration, and cloud deployment.
personal.elevator_pitch:
I'm Douglas Mo, bridging
business operations and AI technology. With 2+ years international accounting
experience (managing $12M annual revenue) and intensive AI development training, I
build production-grade intelligent systems that solve real business problems. My
unique cross-functional background—from reducing distributor churn 27% at BF Suma
to deploying 95% accuracy RAG systems—helps me understand both technical
implementation and measurable business impact. I turn data into decisions and AI into
ROI.
